Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.rmi

Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.rmi.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, VirtualView, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIClient extends UnicastRemoteObject implements VirtualView, Client
This class represents the client side of the RMI connection.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • run

      private void run() throws RemoteException
      This method is used to connect the client to the server, it also runs the CLI.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there are issues with the connection.

    • terminationCheckerStart

      private void terminationCheckerStart()
      This method is used to start the termination checker.

    • runCli

      private void runCli() throws IOException
      This method is used to run the CLI. It asks the user to choose the interface, the number of players and the nickname.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there are issues with the input.

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int onHandCard, int onTableCardX, int onTableCardY, int onTableCardCorner, boolean isFront)
      This method plays a card. It calls the playCard method of the server.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface Client
      Parameters:
      onHandCard - the card on hand to play.
      onTableCardX - the x position of the card on the table on which to play the card.
      onTableCardY - the y position of the card on the table on which to play the card.
      onTableCardCorner - the corner of the card on the table on which to play the card.
      isFront - if the card is played on the front.
      Returns:
      true if the card is played, false otherwise.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(int position)
      This method is used to draw a card. It calls the drawCard method of the server. It sets the isMyTurn variable to false. It calls the showTurn method of the view.
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface Client
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the card to draw.

    • getNumOfPlayers

      private void getNumOfPlayers()
      This method is used to get the number of players. It calls the getNumOfPlayers method of the server and sets the numOfPlayers variable.

    • connectToServer

      public static void connectToServer()
      This method is used to set the ip and the port of the server and connect to it. It asks the user to insert the ip and the port of the server. If the connection is successful, it creates a new RMIClient and runs it.
